keyMoments.title: Uses Gear Third to Break Free from Net
keyMoments.description: Trapped inside Largo's net-body, Luffy activates Gear Third to inflate his body and break free from the trap.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates tactical use of Gear Third for defense and escape rather than just offense.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Largo with Gomu Gomu no Gigant Pistol
keyMoments.description: Using Gear Third, Luffy defeats Largo with a devastating Gigant Pistol that destroys his ship.
keyMoments.significance: Concludes the main conflict of the Little East Blue Arc and protects the island.

keyMoments.title: Friendly Rematch with Boss Ends in Draw
keyMoments.description: Engages in a competitive friendly battle with Boss that ends in a tie, showing mutual respect.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's sportsmanship and ability to make friends through combat.

abilities.description: A Gear Third technique where Luffy inflates his arm to gigantic size and delivers a massive punch with devastating force.

keyMoments.title: Leads Villagers in Strategic Ambush
keyMoments.description: Nami pretends to evacuate villagers but leads them through secret tunnels to launch a surprise attack on the Amigo Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Nami's tactical intelligence and leadership abilities in coordinating a successful guerrilla warfare strategy.

keyMoments.title: Fights Amigo Pirates with Sanji
keyMoments.description: Zoro engages in combat with the Amigo Pirates alongside Sanji, serving as the frontline defense for Little East Blue.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Straw Hats working as a coordinated team to protect the island.

keyMoments.title: Fights Amigo Pirates with Zoro
keyMoments.description: Sanji battles members of the Amigo Pirates alongside Zoro while Nami executes her plan.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's role as one of the crew's primary fighters in protecting innocent people.

keyMoments.title: Transforms Body into Net to Trap Luffy
keyMoments.description: Uses Ami Ami no Mi to transform his entire body into a spiked net, trapping Luffy inside his stomach.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the full extent of his Devil Fruit powers in a last-ditch effort to defeat Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Luffy's Gigant Pistol
keyMoments.description: Largo is struck by Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Gigant Pistol and sent flying into his own ship, marking his decisive defeat.
keyMoments.significance: Ends Largo's ambitions to join Shiki's fleet and protects Little East Blue from the Amigo Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Imprisoned with Amigo Pirates
keyMoments.description: Largo and his crew are locked in a cage originally built for Boss, now under the custody of Little East Blue's residents.
keyMoments.significance: Justice is served as the villains are captured and the island is safe.

abilities.description: Transforms entire body into a net structure that can trap opponents inside, dispersing physical force across the net surface.

keyMoments.title: Completes Molting Process
keyMoments.description: Boss undergoes his monthly molt, emerging with teal coloring, light green fur, larger tusks, and fire-breathing capability.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Boss's unique biology as an artificially created creature with continuous growth and new abilities.

keyMoments.title: Battles Luffy to a Draw
keyMoments.description: Engages in a friendly but competitive battle with Luffy that ends in a tie.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Boss's strength and his bond with Luffy as worthy rivals.

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Shiki's Artificial Creation
keyMoments.description: It is revealed that Boss was artificially created by Dr. Indigo as part of Shiki's army of modified super-animals.
keyMoments.significance: Explains Boss's unusual abilities and connects him to the larger Strong World plot.

abilities.description: After molting, Boss can breathe fire from openings in his horns, adding a powerful ranged attack to his arsenal.
Boss undergoes monthly molting that increases his size, strength, and abilities with each transformation.

reveals.information: Created by Dr. Indigo as part of Shiki's modified creature army

keyMoments.title: Overcomes Hatred of Pirates
keyMoments.description: After witnessing the Straw Hats' heroism in protecting Boss and Little East Blue, Yoko overcomes her deep-seated hatred of pirates and warmly bids them farewell.
keyMoments.significance: Completes Yoko's character arc, showing that prejudice can be overcome through understanding and direct experience.

relationships.description: Yoko's deceased father who was killed by pirates five years ago, leading to her initial hatred of all pirates.

evolutionMoments.description: Yoko honors her father's memory while overcoming the prejudice his death instilled in her.

relationships.description: Yoko found Boss in the forest and bonded with him, seeing her lost father reflected in his strength.

keyMoments.title: Appears in Flashback
keyMoments.description: Ryudo appears in flashback sequences showing his role as a Marine who protected Little East Blue and his relationship with his daughter Yoko before his death.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial backstory for Yoko's character and explains her hatred of pirates.

statusHistory.reason: Killed by pirates five years before the events of the Little East Blue Arc

relationships.description: Ryudo was Yoko's father who loved her very much. His death at the hands of pirates shaped her worldview.

reveals.information: Died protecting Little East Blue from a pirate attack five years prior

keyMoments.title: Reveals Boss as Part of Modified Creature Army
keyMoments.description: Shiki is shown monitoring various modified animals with glowing eyes as part of his army for global conquest.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Shiki's master plan to create biological weapons and sets up the Strong World movie conflict.

keyMoments.title: Dismisses Largo's Failure
keyMoments.description: Shiki observes his modified creatures and states that Largo's defeat is merely a minor setback to his ultimate plan.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Shiki's confidence and the scope of his ambitions beyond just capturing Boss.
keyMoments.quote: This one setback won't upset my ultimate plan.

reveals.information: Creating an army of modified super-animals for global conquest

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Boss's Creator
keyMoments.description: Dr. Indigo is mentioned and revealed as the scientist responsible for creating Boss and other modified creatures for Shiki's army.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Dr. Indigo as Shiki's chief scientist and the mastermind behind the biological weapons program.

reveals.information: Capable of creating modified super-animals through scientific means

keyMoments.title: Scarlet Debut
keyMoments.description: Scarlet makes a brief appearance during the scene showing Shiki monitoring his modified creatures.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces another member of the Golden Lion Pirates crew for the Strong World movie.

keyMoments.title: Imprisoned with Amigo Pirates
keyMoments.description: Corto, along with Largo and the rest of the Amigo Pirates, is imprisoned in the cage originally built for Boss.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of the Amigo Pirates' threat to Little East Blue.

relationships.description: Corto is Largo's brother and serves as his first mate in the Amigo Pirates.
